name: 2025-02-alicloud-client
description:
This campaign is built from two parts:
1) package time-check-server contains an innocent-looking code that sends "date" to a remote server,
2) package alicloud-client is a clone of legitim aliyun-python-sdk-core package, with a small change in the client.py code, where it imports the time-check-server and calls it, but instead of a date, the credentials to the cloud are exfiltrated.
